alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:08AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, eastern Onslow, southwestern Carteret and southwestern Pamlico Counties through 345 AM EST... At 308 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kellum to near Onslow Beach. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, James City, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Pine Knoll Shores, Maysville, Silverdale, Kellum, Midway Park, Belgrade and Broad Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
